tldr: Webpack 5 before `5.76.0` does not avoid cross-realm object access. `ImportParserPlugin.js` mishandles the magic comment feature. An attacker who controls a property of an untrusted object can obtain access to the real global object.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `webpack` library to the patch version.
